body_html:
The issue seemed to have been with my retrain statement. I changed it to this and it worked

python tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py --bottleneck_dir=/tf_files/bottlenecks --model_dir=/tf_files/inception --output_graph=/tf_files/retrained_graph.pb --output_labels=/tf_files/retrained_labels.txt --image_dir /tf_files/flower_photos
body_text:
The issue seemed to have been with my retrain statement. I changed it to this and it worked
python tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py --bottleneck_dir=/tf_files/bottlenecks --model_dir=/tf_files/inception --output_graph=/tf_files/retrained_graph.pb --output_labels=/tf_files/retrained_labels.txt --image_dir /tf_files/flower_photos
body:
The issue seemed to have been with my retrain statement. I changed it to this and it worked

`python tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py --bottleneck_dir=/tf_files/bottlenecks --model_dir=/tf_files/inception --output_graph=/tf_files/retrained_graph.pb --output_labels=/tf_files/retrained_labels.txt --image_dir /tf_files/flower_photos`
